forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 23F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low -7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will transition to snow showers late. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
